Bayesian Regression Model for Multivariate Count Data





An R package designed to fit a Bayesian Regression Model for multivariate count data where the data is distributed as Conway-Maxwell-Poisson distribution





May 30, 2024


Mauro Florez












Lung Disease Risk Prediction in a Coal Mine





Survival Model to predict the risk of contracting a lung disease for workers of one of the largest coal mines in America





Jan 10, 2019


Mauro Florez

title: Lung Disease Risk Prediction in a Coal Mine
text:
library(ggplot2)
coefficients <- c(2.055, 21.266)
riesgo <- function(t,beta){(t/21.266)^2.055*beta}
#Funciones de Riesgo

ggplot(data.frame(x = c(0, 20)), aes(x)) +
  stat_function(fun = function(x) riesgo(x, 0.2062), aes(colour = "Low")) + 
  stat_function(fun = function(x) riesgo(x, 0.4697), aes(colour = "Medium")) + 
  stat_function(fun = function(x) riesgo(x, 0.3464), aes(colour = "High")) + 
  stat_function(fun = function(x) riesgo(x, 1), aes(colour = "Extreme")) + 
  labs(x = "Years", y = paste("Risk -", expression(h[x](t)))) + 
  scale_color_manual(name = "Group",
                     breaks = c("Extreme", "High", "Medium", "Low"),
                     values = c("#A76C1A","#58B368","#195699","#454D66")) +
  theme_classic()

title: Mauro Florez
text:
I am a PhD Candidate in Statistics at Rice University. My research focuses on developing Bayesian models for multivariate data, working under the direction of Dr.Â Marina Vannucci. I am passionate about formulating innovative statistical methods to analyze different types of data, with a diverse range of applications, from healthcare to sports.
When I am not immersed in data and research, I love soccer â€“watching or playingâ€“ as well as exploring new places and taking pictures. Check out some of my travel photos here.

title: Bayesian Regression Model for Multivariate Count Data
text: MultRegCMP is an R package that I designed to fit a Bayesian Multivariate regression model for count data. This model have been used to analyze football and baseball scores. A practical example on how to use it can be found in this Football Vignette.

title: Bayesian Regression Model for Multivariate Count Data
text: MultRegCMP is an R package that I designed to fit a Bayesian Multivariate regression model for count data. This model have been used to analyze football and baseball scores. A practical example on how to use it can be found in this Football Vignette.

title: Mauro Florez
text:
Research Interests


Bayesian Modeling
Statistical Computing
Graphical Models
Applied Statistics
Machine Learning





My latest projects involve developing frameworks for estimating graphical models that identify relationships or dependencies between different mixed data types.
A list of projects can be found here.

title: Curriculum Vitae
text:
EDUCATION
Doctor of Philosophy â€“ Econometrics and Business Statistics  Monash University Aug 2021 â€” Present

New principles and methods for complex data preparation and integration, with applications to official statistics, web-scrapped data and satellite raster images
Monash Data Futures Institute PhD Top-Up Scholarship (2021-2024)
Expected submission date: Nov 2024

title: Curriculum Vitae
text:
WORK EXPERIENCE

Data Scientist
Freelance, Multiple Clients Jan 2020 â€“ June 2021
Providing data collection, pre-processing, exploratory analysis and modelling services to clients in the early R&D stages of developing data driven products. Projects include:

Data description and preliminary product feasibility insights for a start-up real estate bond platform; including assessing suitability of various property transaction databases for use in initial product prototype.
Development of statistical anomaly detection regimes and key historical insights from internet quality time-series data for use in parametric insurance products, including documenting analysis tools in an R package.
